title: Designing Higher Education Teaching Methods and Action Research Practices Using ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and understanding of higher education contexts
context.additional_context: Short-term workshop for practitioners conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment; emphasizes development of AI-integrated instructional methods directly applicable to professional settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain a ChatGPT-based action research instructional design framework in three or more stages.
Learners can develop two or more ChatGPT prompt design and feedback utilization strategies based on social domain case studies.
Learners can implement and analyze the effectiveness of their teaching method improvement plans through AI-human collaboration in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
